mapper.select: SELECT o.c_time ,o.ostate,o.code,o.order_id ,o.seat,o.money ,cr.name ,o.pay_state, m.mpic ,m.mName,c.c_name,c.c_address,ms.playtime from `orders` o LEFT JOIN movie_showtime ms on o.movie_showtime_id = ms.id LEFT JOIN cinema c on ms.cid = c.id LEFT JOIN movie m on ms.mid = m.id LEFT JOIN cinema_room cr on ms.room_id = cr.id and cr.cid=ms.cid WHERE o.uid=#{uid} and isdel!=1 and o.ostate between 1 and 49 ORDER BY o.c_time desc LIMIT #{start}, #{num}

SELECT o.uid,o.c_time ,o.code,o.seat_id,o.ostate,o.order_id ,o.seat,o.money ,cr.name , o.pay_state,m.mpic ,m.mName,c.aid,c.c_name,c.c_address,c.phone,ms.playtime from `orders` o LEFT JOIN movie_showtime ms on o.movie_showtime_id = ms.id LEFT JOIN cinema c on ms.cid = c.id LEFT JOIN movie m on ms.mid = m.id LEFT JOIN cinema_room cr on ms.room_id = cr.id WHERE o.order_id=#{oid} and cr.cid=ms.cid and o.ostate between 0 and 49;

SELECT o.c_time ,o.ostate,o.code,o.order_id ,o.seat,o.money ,cr.name ,o.pay_state,m.mpic ,m.mName,c.c_name,c.c_address,ms.playtime from `orders` o LEFT JOIN movie_showtime ms on o.movie_showtime_id = ms.id LEFT JOIN cinema c on ms.cid = c.id LEFT JOIN movie m on ms.mid = m.id LEFT JOIN cinema_room cr on ms.room_id = cr.id WHERE o.uid=#{uid} and cr.cid=ms.cid and isdel!=1 and o.ostate between 1 and 49 ORDER BY o.c_time desc LIMIT #{start}, #{num};
